metadata.title: CVE-2019-15140 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
coders/mat.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (use-after-free and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact by crafting a Matlab image file that is mishandledin ReadImage in MagickCore/constitute.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15140` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagick++-6.q16-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-9t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6.q16-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7-extra - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickwand-6.q16-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-7t64 - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
perlmagick - 8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.10.23+dfsg-2.1ubuntu9').
